actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to make all privately owned airports which are used for public purposes eligible for assistance under that act.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to revise the definition of "public-use airport" to include any privately owned airport used for public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to make all privately owned airports which are used for public purposes eligible for assistance under that act.
